content.en: Material Modeling: Scientists have been using algorithms to study the formation and properties of different materials, such as gels and aerogels. For example, the Fluctuating Bond Aggregation (FBA) algorithm allows for cluster deformations during gel formation. Another algorithm, called the Diffusion-Limited Cluster-Cluster Aggregation (DLCA) algorithm, is used to generate models and simulate the growth of silica aerogels. These algorithms help researchers understand the relationship between the structure and properties of these materials.
content.da: Materialemodellering: Forskere har brugt algoritmer til at studere dannelsen og egenskaberne af forskellige materialer, såsom geler og aerogeler. For eksempel tillader Fluctuating Bond Aggregation (FBA) algoritmen deformationer af klynger under geldannelse. En anden algoritme, kaldet Diffusion-Limited Cluster-Cluster Aggregation (DLCA) algoritmen, bruges til at generere modeller og simulere væksten af silica aerogeler. Disse algoritmer hjælper forskere med at forstå forholdet mellem strukturen og egenskaberne af disse materialer.
